    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates some CurrencyCollection objects to be tested.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testGetCurrencyAtIdx

        public void testGetCurrencyAtIdx()
        Test method for CurrencyCollection.getCurrencyAtIdx(int) . Checks boundary conditions on both ends of the array.

      • testModifyDenomination

        public void testModifyDenomination()
        Test method for CurrencyCollection.modifyDenomination(int, int) . Tests that modifying the denomination of a collection changes its balance, and that it is not possible to modify nonexistent currencies or cause the collection to have a negative number of a certain currency.

      • testDepositCurrencyCollection

        public void testDepositCurrencyCollection()
        Test method for CurrencyCollection.depositCurrencyCollection(edu.ncsu.csc216.cash_register.CurrencyCollection) . Tests that making a deposit changes the balance of a collection.

      • testRefundByAmount

        public void testRefundByAmount()
        Test method for CurrencyCollection.refundByAmount(int) . Tests that the refund is the correct amount, the value of the collection decreases correctly, and that is is not possible to refund when there is an insufficient balance in the register.

      • testGetCurrencyCollection

        public void testGetCurrencyCollection()
        Test method for CurrencyCollection.getCurrencyCollection() . Tests that the proper collection is returned, and that currency values match the expected values.

      • testGetBalance

        public void testGetBalance()
        Test method for CurrencyCollection.getBalance(). Tests that getBalance() returns the proper balance of a collection.
